name: Kaalyug Chapter1: A Nightmare
description:
Kaalyug is a Journey to the end of time...

It is a Flashback story of 2016
That Starts with Mohit's Nightmare. Where he finds out presence of some negative energy inside his school...
His Journey Starts When Some newspapers and news channels claim that his school is not safe 
And it is not safe to go there after 6pm...
as Mohit lives somewhere near that school, He feels that energy while asleep....

Difficulty Level: High on Chai
